structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Powers of KRS 96.350 to 96.510 possessed by urban-county governments.
law.text: Having the powers of the city of the highest class at the time of the creation of an urban-county government, the provisions of KRS 96.350 to 96.510 are hereby affirmed to be possessed by urban-county governments. Any reference to a city, mayor, city legislative body, or agency of a city in KRS 96.350 to 96.510 shall also mean an urban-county government, mayor of an urban-county government, legislative body of an urban-county government, or agency of an urban-county government, respectively.
law.history: Created 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 165, effective January 1, 2015.
